title: tuNai tara vENumE
sahitya:
tuNai tara vENumE gaNanAthanE un iNaiyaDi paNIndiDum enai aNaindiDum


anupallavi

  iNaiyilA ezhilOnun iLaiyOn pugazh pADa tuNiyum eLiyOn paNiyai eLidAkkum


caraNam    eDutta muyarcci tanai ettanaiyO vidattil taDuttu niruttiDum taDaiyE kurukkiDAmal
aDutta sOrvAl adai viDuttiDA Arvattai koDuttEn Akkam kUDu mUkkamUTTum
